list.name: Default
list.comment: Continuing to refactor code to conform with RuboCop rules.

task.summary: Default task
Started refactoring the random name generator to use an OO approach rather than a script approach. Also using rspec tests. Still a long way to go from completion.
Added three letter length strategy + some modifications to two letter length strategy
Finished the new probability tables system for use with random_name_generator
Cleaned up the RandomNameGenerator project by deleting useless files.
Corrected some bugs
Corrected some bugs
Corrected error in last commit
RandomNameGenerator is working again pretty fine with new OO strategy.
Corrected a bug and refactored some code
Added a YAML InputLoader, added to_file method on ProbabilityTable, corrected a bug which hampered proper letter selection in RandomNameGenerator.
Started working on City again.
Plugged in small_city_factory in city_map_output
Worked on the city factories.
Added river_filter to map_generator.
Fixed a bug where all neighbors were equal and river filter got stuck into infinite loop.
Fixed bugs with river_filter.
Fixed bugs with river_filter.
Added some caves and cities to the map.
Changing nameable to RandomNameGenerator
Added snow to worldmap. Corrected CitySpecificationLocation and added exception handling to RandomNameGenerator.
Corrected some minor stuff.
Added a map overview to the map explorer. Added road tiles. Tweaked map_factory.
Now displays ground tiles in map_explorer.
Added EmptyTiles. Added a passable attributes to tiles. Prevented walking on non passable tiles. Selected a starting location based on city locations.
Corrected some display bugs
Added gfx including city tiles preview to map overview.
Refactored and fixed some todos. Including speeding up city and cave location specification.
Added Rakefile for specs
Experimented with some ground textures. Not really satisfied for the moment.
Started experimenting with roads.
Worked on road generation
Fixed wrong method name error.
Show map name in Map Explorer
Fixed comments
Added start of rules engine and battle coordinator.
Corrected syntax error.
Put some stuff in readme file.
Deleted some useless files.
Moved MapOverview to UI folder.
Moved InfoBox to it's own file.
Created Ui Constants module.
Moved ViewPort rendering to it's own class.
Moved some values to UiConstants and did some refactoring on ViewPort.
Removed unecessary require.
Updated readme.
Added base system for coordinate (tile) events. Started adding shop events and thus shops. Map creation refactoring.
Random name generation for shop events.
Random name generation for shop events.
Fixed path to media for establishment name generator.
Added basic city events (right now skeleton code for Shop, Inn, Temple and Guild events in city maps).
Changed previous position to stack (implemented via array) instead of single value to allow for multiple levels of return positions.
Corrected some bugs with events.
Updated rakefile to run unit tests.
Added basic tests for events.
Worked on actions mechanism for base character class.
Worked on actions mechanism for base character class.
Worked on actions mechanism for base character class.
Worked on actions mechanism for base character class.
Added manual targeting for user actions.
Added defaults effects for stats. Added modules that allows updating of said effects. Added a spec file to tests said module. Called module from the Act method in baseclass.
Added some basic treasure tables.
Corrected random copy paste error in last check-in.
Worked on armors.
Added enchantment null object and applied it to armor in super initializer.
Small changes on material enchantments.
Added MIT license file.
Removed unecessary rakefile.
Refactored to remove shuffle on array to create and reuse existing Random instances ( http://stackoverflow.com/a/2773866/153797 ).
Add project page to readme.
Worked on enchantments, armors and armor generation.
Corrected typo in armor prices.
Changed shields and weapons.
Integration of https://github.com/carl-ellis/Dungeon code to generate base random dungeon. Still need to integrate in existing maps and work on a few things.
Changed Dungeon's entrance to gameproject's doors.
Added entrance to dungeon.
Pass DungeonFactory in WorldMap.
Changed a require directive to move in file that made most sense.
Corrected bug with CityMapOutput where a crash occured because it could not find media files for random name generation of shops and temples (which weren't used in CityMapOutput).
DungeonFactory now has members for width and height.
Added dungeons to caves. Dungeons not displaying/behaving correctly like in DungeonMapOutput. Still need to investigate the issue.
Fixed some of the perspective problem in the viewport by adding another column of tiles starting at the second row.
Removed "puts" in Dungeon code.
Fixed bad mapping of Maze/Dungeons in map_explorer.
Refactored cities and dungeons into sub-maps belonging to world map.
Refactored changing between differents maps. Used same method to determine starting location. Reduced two ifs into one. Moved logic in inner sub method.
Added item_level in determining random armor generation.
Can now get in and out of sub-maps (cities, caves, etc.)
Reformated code with RubyMine.
Added mocks to world_map_test
Fixed some file path name error for files that contained random name data.
Fixed rspec errors due to refactoring.
Added shields to armor generator.
Added more weapons.
Changed stats to use them form their own class. Changed hp to have max and current hp.
Added basic game class which right now only displays a temporary title screen.
Refactoring following running RuboCop in -lint mode.
Introduced RuboCop config files. Started major refactoring on all project to conform to rules as defined in config files.
Continuing to refactor code to conform with RuboCop rules.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Continuing to refactor code to conform with RuboCop rules.
